name: kidney stone
description: Kidney stone, also known as renal calculi or nephrolithiasis, refers to a solid concretion or crystal aggregation formed in the kidney from substances found in urine. These stones can vary in size, composition, and location. Imaging modalities, assess the size, location, and characteristics of kidney stones, aiding in diagnosis

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: This indicates whether kidney stone is present.

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: cannot determine whether kidney stone is present

values.name: unknown
values.description: uncertainty regarding the presence of kidney stone

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: the anatomical region of the kidney stone
